everchanging_realm.name: The Everchanging Realm
everchanging_realm.description: A vast and mutable realm where landscapes shift and new wonders (or dangers) constantly emerge.

lore_fragments.ancient_civilizations: Whispers of long-lost civilizations and their forgotten technologies.
lore_fragments.cosmic_anomalies: Occasional strange celestial events that influence the realm.

event_prompts.new_arrival: An unexpected character or entity arrives, bringing change.
event_prompts.environmental_shift: The immediate environment undergoes a sudden or gradual transformation.
event_prompts.resource_scarcity: A vital resource becomes scarce, prompting action or conflict.
event_prompts.mysterious_phenomenon: A strange, unexplained event occurs, inviting investigation.
event_prompts.character_driven_conflict: A conflict arises from existing character relationships or desires.

wanderer_elara.name: Elara Meadowlight
wanderer_elara.motivation: Decipher the mirage's message before the sands consume it.

scribe_korbin.motivation: To chronicle the endless history of the Everchanging Realm.
